Posts.Content: Jameywolff wrote: I finished my ACT chemo 1 1/4 years ago and  and continue to have some mild neuropathy in the soles of my feet that accupuncture doesn't eliminate.  I had some thickening of my nails and discoloration right after chemo but it seemed to be improving until I lightly buffed my toenails last month.  I immediately developed hematomas under several nails, subsequently lost the nails and now have more discoloration (probably blood) in others.  When I showed my oncologist, she called them "funky toes" but did not give me any suggestions for treatment.  Any suggestions for either the neuropathy or "funky toes" would be welcome. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: funky toes and buzzy soles Jameywolff Jameywolff
